call.sql: SELECT t1.PARTY_ID, t1.ATTRIBUTE24, t0.ACCOUNT_NUMBER, t0.PARTY_ID FROM HZ_CUST_ACCOUNTS t0, HZ_PARTIES t1 WHERE ((t0.ACCOUNT_NUMBER = #p_account_number) AND (t0.PARTY_ID = t1.PARTY_ID))
select p.attribute24 from hz_parties p, hz_cust_accounts a where p.party_id = a.party_id and a.account_number = p_account_number ;
